scripts.clear: yarn clear:cache && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json
scripts.build:push: git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -f
scripts.postdeps: git add . && git commit -m 'build(deps): bumped external dependencies' && git push
scripts.changelog: changelog -t $(git log --grep='rel(' --format='%H' --max-count=2 | head -n 2 | tail -1)..$(git log --grep='rel(' --format='%H' --max-count=2 | head -n 1) -x rel,build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.rel:major: lerna publish major -y && yarn deps && yarn build && yarn build:push && yarn version --major && yarn changelog && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:minor: lerna publish minor -y && yarn deps && yarn build && yarn build:push && yarn version --minor && yarn changelog && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:patch: lerna publish patch -y && yarn deps && yarn build && yarn build:push && yarn version --patch && yarn changelog && yarn rel:push
